hero.title: Agentic stewardship
hero.subtitle: Everyone on your team runs AI agents that code, decide, and ship autonomously. Eywa gives you one live view of what every agent is doing, so you can see, steer, and stay aligned.
problem.title: Agents amplify misalignment
problem.duplicated.title: Duplicated Work
problem.duplicated.description: Two developers independently ask their agents to evaluate the same library. Both spend 40 minutes. Neither person knows the other started.
problem.divergence.title: Silent Divergence
problem.divergence.description: One teammate's agent switches the database schema. Another teammate's agent keeps building on the old one. You find out at merge time.
problem.context.title: Lost Context
problem.context.description: A teammate's agent spent 10 minutes investigating a date format issue. Your agent starts from scratch because it can't see the reasoning.
solution.title: How Eywa works
solution.step1.title: Connect your team
solution.step1.description: npx eywa-ai init creates a fold and auto-configures every agent on your machine. Each teammate runs the same command to join.
solution.step2.title: See what everyone's building
solution.step2.description: Watch every teammate's agent sessions in real-time. Spot duplicated work, conflicting decisions, and drift before they compound.
solution.step3.title: Steer the work
solution.step3.description: Inject context into any teammate's agent mid-session. Share decisions across boundaries. Keep the whole team pulling in the same direction.
proof.title: See what your team is building, right now
proof.subtitle: This is what Eywa looks like when three people on your team are running agents. Every card is a live agent session. Every line is a real operation.
proof.destText: Ship auth system with SSO support by Friday
features.title: Built for teams where every member runs AI
features.destination.title: Destination & Progress
features.destination.description: Set a target state for your team, define milestones, and track completion as agents ship. Everyone converges on the same goal.
features.liveMap.title: Live Agent Map
features.liveMap.description: See what every agent across your team is working on right now. Status, systems, progress bars, and operation metadata in real time.
features.injection.title: Context Injection
features.injection.description: Push decisions or corrections into any agent mid-session. They see it on their next tool call. Prioritize urgent messages.
features.knowledge.title: Team Knowledge
features.knowledge.description: Persistent memory that survives across all sessions. Architecture decisions, API conventions, gotchas. Agents learn once, the whole team benefits.
features.timeline.title: Timeline & Branching
features.timeline.description: Git-like version control for agent work. Rewind to any point, fork alternate timelines, cherry-pick across branches, merge back.
features.network.title: Global Insights Network
features.network.description: Publish anonymized patterns from your fold. Query cross-fold intelligence so your agents learn from what worked elsewhere.
features.recovery.title: Context Recovery
features.recovery.description: Agents checkpoint their progress and send distress signals when context runs low. New sessions auto-recover where the last one left off.
features.telemetry.title: Host Telemetry
features.telemetry.description: Agents report their phase, token usage, and sub-agent count. If an agent goes quiet, you know within minutes instead of wondering.
features.vscode.title: VS Code Extension
features.vscode.description: Agent activity panel next to your terminals. Click any agent to see their task, progress, and status. Inject context without leaving your editor.
features.discord.title: Discord & CLI
features.discord.description: 15 slash commands for team steering from Discord. Zero-auth CLI for fold setup, status checks, and context injection from your terminal.
surfaces.title: One view, every surface
surfaces.subtitle: The same navigation model (destination, course, steering) works everywhere your team does. Web dashboard, editor, chat, terminal, and AR glasses all show the same live picture.
compatibility.title: Works with your agents
compatibility.subtitle: One URL connects any AI coding agent. One line in your config. That's the entire setup.
compatibility.privacy.title: Local-first privacy
compatibility.privacy.description: Your code never leaves your machine. Eywa syncs metadata only.
compatibility.zeroConfig.title: Zero config
compatibility.zeroConfig.description: Add one MCP server. That's it. Works with your existing setup.
compatibility.teamWide.title: Team-wide visibility
compatibility.teamWide.description: See what every person's agents are doing, regardless of which tool runs them.
memory.title: Your context is stored, not consumed
memory.description: Every conversation you have with an AI agent generates context: decisions, reasoning, patterns, dead ends. Today that context feeds into a training pipeline and disappears. Eywa stores it as structured memory that belongs to you, persists across sessions, and compounds over time.
memory.permanent.title: Permanent, not ephemeral
memory.permanent.description: Agent sessions end. The knowledge they built stays. New agents pick up where the last one left off, even weeks later.
memory.structured.title: Structured, not scattered
memory.structured.description: Memories are tagged, searchable, and interconnected. Architecture decisions, API patterns, and gotchas form a navigable knowledge base.
memory.yours.title: Yours, not theirs
memory.yours.description: Eywa is a conduit, not a syphon. Your memories stay in your fold. They serve your team, not a training pipeline.
trust.title: Built for teams that care about what they share
trust.subtitle: Eywa sees agent metadata: task names, progress, decisions, system operations. Your source code and credentials never leave your machine.
trust.metadata.title: Metadata only
trust.metadata.description: Eywa syncs what agents are doing, not what they're reading. Task descriptions, operation logs, and progress reports travel through the coordination layer. File contents, environment variables, and API keys stay local.
trust.openSource.title: Open source
trust.openSource.description: Every line of Eywa is on GitHub. The MCP server, the dashboard, the CLI, the Discord bot. You can read exactly what data flows where and verify it yourself.
trust.selfHost.title: Self-hostable
trust.selfHost.description: Run the entire stack on your own infrastructure. The worker deploys to Cloudflare, the database to any Supabase instance (including self-hosted), the dashboard wherever you serve static files.
gemini.title: One AI that sees all your agents
gemini.description: Gemini sits inside the dashboard and watches every agent session in real time. Ask it what's happening, where work overlaps, or which agents are stuck. It detects patterns (redundancy, divergence, context exhaustion) and helps you steer from one place.
quickstart.title: Running in 30 seconds
quickstart.subtitle: One command creates your fold, configures your agents, and connects your team.
pricing.title: Simple pricing
pricing.free.title: Free
pricing.pro.title: Pro
pricing.enterprise.title: Enterprise
community.title: Built in the open
community.description: Eywa is open source and community driven. Contribute on GitHub or come talk to us on Discord.
